Exclusively for the Nintendo Wii published KIDDINX the 35th anniversary of Benjamin the Elephant varied Wii entry-level product for the little ones . In 20 mini games where children can explore the Town Zoo together with Benjamin and Otto and along the way learn how to use the game console . Different levels of difficulty make sure that the games even with frequent use is not boring , a digital scrapbook provides the necessary incentive to the level to successfully unlock and stickers. An intuitive game guide and full setting are related to this target group by itself .

Discover the Town Zoo - and experience with Benjamin and Otto a great animal - Zooabenteuer after another! You can help Karl and feed the animals , puzzles with the penguins or compete with Schnippi the turtle race guards .
